core:assignAction.core:comment: One of CardPAN or CardNumberHashed should be not empty

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: (enactor:empty(iINRange) || iINRange.customAttributes1.default) ? cardPAN : strings:substring(cardPAN, iINRange.customAttributes1.start - iINRange.PANAttributes.start, iINRange.customAttributes1.length + iINRange.customAttributes1.start - iINRange.PANAttributes.start)

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set the LoyaltyCardNumber to null for Amex Loyalty Cards. But, if the Hashed Card Number is not present, set it to a mangled version of the card number to act as a flag to receipt printing that some loyalty details have actually been captured, since if we are offline there is no other indication. Hashed card number will not be present in the non-payment-services world.
